page.title: 17 Doctors. Solicitors
page.content: {Any other services that the {villagers might require has to be {sought outside the village: { Although there is a mobile library {which comes to the villages once every {fortnight,most of the people go {outside,to Bretton or Stamford. { For more important services like {health,doctors can be found for { 7 people in Wansford, { 2 people in Stamford, { 1 person in Peterborough, { and 1 person in Castor. } {To get legal advice and help {villagers use solicitors who can be as {far away as London { 5 use solicitors in Peterborough, {2 use solicitors in Stamford. { Other firms used were situated in {Leicester and Wellingborough. { Banks used are,again,scattered all {over the country.6 people use various
